Package io.github.zero88.jooqx

Interface SQLErrorConverter

All Known Subinterfaces:
JooqErrorConverter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DB2ErrorConverter, JooqErrorConverter.JDBCErrorConverter, MSSQLErrorConverter, MySQLErrorConverter, PgErrorConverter, RuntimeJDBCErrorConverter
public interface SQLErrorConverter
Represents for a maker that unifies SQL error to a general SQL error when executing SQL command on across among Database SPI
Since:
1.0.0
